snippet.textDisplay: President Nelson, I love you so much!!!!!!!
snippet.textOriginal: President Nelson, I love you so much!!!!!!!

snippet.textDisplay:
I'm a fallen member but Heavenly Father had been there for me through the worst of times. My testament is so strong no matter what is said in the media and in the public doesn't shake my faith. I just have trouble staying to the word of wisdom. I have tried everything but I have a very weak soul. Still through all my sins I still love our Heavenly Father, the gospel he has provided and the resurrection of the Church started by the prophet Joseph Smith. That being said I wish all the best blessings on you and you're family during this time stay home be safe. Please keep everyone in our prayers today and everyday. I hope that one day soon I will be able to return to the temple and be able to share my testimony with our Brothers and Sisters again. Amen

Thank you and God Bless
snippet.textOriginal:

Still through all my sins I still love our Heavenly Father, the gospel he has provided and the resurrection of the Church started by the  prophet Joseph Smith. That being said I wish all the best blessings on you and you're family during this time stay home be safe. Please keep everyone in our prayers today and everyday. I hope that one day soon I will be able to return to the temple and be able to share my testimony with our Brothers and Sisters again. Amen

Thank you and God Bless

snippet.textDisplay: Thank You Mr Nelson for the speech. I know that you may feel the Spirit of Heavenly Father. It was very uplifting. What are any revelations or should I say Church plans on rebuilding the fold? All the Stakes and Wards all over the World are going through a tough crisis. This is not the time for the second coming! I hope and pray for the Church to help its members with things they need most. Food and monetary help when needed. This is also not the time for the Self - Reliance Talk or the 10% tithe when people are out of work to provide for themselves and families. Church I am speaking for the 1% that wont say anything, that are scared to talk, that the Church assumes its 1% is ok. I am Praying and Fasting that in hope this Church will help and keep its members. Remember,  we are all accountable for what we do in God's eyes. In Jesus Name ! Amen.

snippet.textDisplay: president nelson! I don't know IF YOU'LL GET TO READ THIS BUT IF YOU DO... I just wanted to let you know that I am amazed to the fact that we think exactly the same (I never liked the fact that the saints were referred to as "Mormons" and you changed that, and I thought that the youth needed more attention and you thought that too!!!)  and you were my favorite apostle before you became the president of the church(after you gave the speech about woman). I love how you are bold, straight-forward but still kind, like the time you told the people in general conference not to make noise when they hear about temples being built next to them(you were able to tell them in a nice bold way, even though I found it kind of funny).... and many other things. I know you are the perfect prophet for this  "exciting"/ hot times because you are so cool! By the way my name is Ines quisseque, I am African from Angola but I am currently in Namibia for studies... It was delight-some to meet you :-)

It was delight-some to meet you :-)

snippet.textDisplay:
I am LDS and and a fulltime RN and Mother. This message could not have come at a better time. While everyone here in CA are being told to stay home as a new announcement from our government, we nurses have to leave our homes and family to take care of the rest. Our jobs are not easy and no matter how tough we pretend to be, we are also human and is at times very scary. I am grateful to have a living prophet guiding us and comforting us telling us this too shall pass. Above all, I am grateful to our loving Heavenly Father for watching over us and keeping his promises as we obey his commandments. God bless all of you out there. I am honored and humbled to serve my brothers and sisters through the healthcare profession. It is such a sacred mission God has called us to.
Thank you prophet for such comforting words. I extend the invitation to all who have an open heart and mind to let the love of God be felt through the kind reminders such as this one of the love that God feels for all of us. He is more than willing to come into our lives and bless us if we only let him enter our hearts.
As this man of God said, the lord is bound to his part as we do ours.
God bless all of us during this trialing times.
snippet.textOriginal:

snippet.textDisplay:
President Nelson you have been telling us for over a year to get ready things are getting exciting!! ...... Even though I know you never could of foreseen all of this happening , I do know all the things you started since you became prophet is truly inspired for these times that are unfolding ... The focus on home study program etc, counseling us to so what is spiritually needed because time is running out etc, Take vitamins get rest things going to be getting exciting and In the coming day it will not be possible to survive spiritually without the holy ghost are a few of the ones that are ringing in my ear now !! Thank you dear President! Please be safe take care

snippet.textDisplay: We love you too beloved Prophet Russell M. Nelson! As an avid student of Jesus Christ's ministry, I am forever hopeful and willful about this incredible year. We are so very blessed to have the restoration and fullness of His church on this magnanimous planet Earth here and now. Let us all go and do what He commands with exceedingly joy. For the Prophet's genuine words of love are confirming revelation from the Savior Jesus Christ. Let us carry this inspiration and be a hero to one another in these dire and unusual times. As we do, this display of kindness shows our obedience,  bc charity is truly pure love of in His sacred name Jesus Christ. Furthermore,  please save the date bc In 2 weeks Easter weekend, the upcoming Bicentennial Year themed "Hear Him" General Conference will broadcast far and wide via satellite and live streaming via UT. Let us act on the invitations to immerse ourselvesin the glorious light with others.
snippet.textOriginal: We love you too beloved Prophet Russell M. Nelson! As an avid student of Jesus Christ's ministry, I am forever hopeful and willful about this incredible year. We are so very blessed to have the restoration and fullness of His church on this magnanimous planet Earth here and now. Let us all go and do what He commands with exceedingly joy. For the Prophet's genuine words of love are confirming revelation from the Savior Jesus Christ. Let us carry this inspiration and be a hero to one another in these dire and unusual times. As we do, this display of kindness shows our obedience,  bc charity is truly pure love of in His sacred name Jesus Christ. Furthermore,  please save the date bc In 2 weeks Easter weekend, the upcoming Bicentennial Year themed "Hear Him" General Conference will broadcast far and wide via satellite and live streaming via UT. Let us act on the invitations to immerse ourselvesin the glorious light with others.

snippet.textDisplay:
I reposted this on facebook:

“More than 1 year before the Corona Virus outbreak, President Russell M. Nelson received a revelation from the Lord to implement a HOME CENTERED - CHURCH SUPPORTED CURRICULUM wherein a Scripture study became home-based rather than church-based, learner-centered rather than teacher-centered, and focused on parents-learner interaction rather than teacher-learner interaction.

Recently, with the coronavirus outbreak, Latter- Day Saint chapels are closed, the temples are closed, and missionary works are closed in some parts of the world. However, with the home-centered curriculum, Latter-Day Saints can still generate spiritual light to overcome the fiery darts of the adversary.”

That said all members of the church can still worship and learn the gospel inside their homes especially now that the situation needs total lockdown in most countries. We use the manual provided by the church called “Come, Follow Me” in reference to Jesus Christ’s invitation recorded in the New Testament. This is an inspired move implemented even before the virus outbreak. For this reason, our worship continues even without physical gathering.

I know that the Lord calls Prophets to help guide us in these latter days. He did call many Prophets long ago and continues to do so today because we need them, more than ever.
snippet.textOriginal:

snippet.textDisplay: I had to watch it again in light of some of the comments here. I hear this man a lot and I can say that he's always like this. He is always calm, always expresses his love to everyone in a way that makes it feel like he's talking only to you, and always positive. If you need a lift check out any of his official videos. You may disagree with him on some things but he is absolutely sincere in his love and optimism. As members of this church we believe he is not only the president of the church but also the prophet of the world. That means he has a message for you, regardless of your sexual orientation, religious position or status, or any other label. He will tell you what God wants you personally to know

snippet.textDisplay:
One thing I love about this is when he says “I love you” at the end. It just makes my heart full. In 2 Chronicles 7:13-15 it states : “If I shut up heaven that there be no rain, or if I command the locusts to devour the land, or if I send pestilence among my people;
If my people, which are called by my name, shall humble themselves, and pray, and seek my face, and turn from their wicked ways; then will I hear from heaven, and will forgive their sin, and will heal their land.
Now mine eyes shall be open, and mine ears attent unto the prayer that is made in this place.”
God is here and with us. In verse 13 we can reflect back in the Australian wildfires, due to the lack of rain, the locust swarms in Africa, and of course COVID-19. If we can repent and learn to love each other despite the social distancing, god will forgive us, and allow this trail to pass soon. we turn to him for help and seek him. He is listening and like President Nelson said, this will soon pass. Keep faith and wash your hands haha.
snippet.textOriginal:

If my people, which are called by my name, shall humble themselves, and pray, and seek my face, and turn from their wicked ways; then will I hear from heaven, and will forgive their sin, and will heal their land.
Now mine eyes shall be open, and mine ears attent unto the prayer that is made in this place.”

snippet.textDisplay: Very well said Prophet Nelson! Thank you for thy blessing to comfort us in times of calamity. Keep Safe and Stay Healthy Everyone!

snippet.textDisplay: "Suffering produces endurance, endurance produces character, and character produces hope." - Romans 5:3-4.
snippet.textOriginal: "Suffering produces endurance, endurance produces character, and character produces hope." - Romans 5:3-4.

snippet.textDisplay: All the glory to our heavenly father . Jesus Christ is lord and savior and the one and only living loving lord.  💘 God bless the whole world and may all turn back to our heavenly father our blessed lord and savior.  Amen 💘
